entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
